definition: Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev (1834-1907), Russian chemist who introduced the periodic table

sentences.english: 869, Mendeleev, here is a picture of him taken from that period.
sentences.chinese: 869年，门捷列夫，这是他那个时期的照片。

sentences.english: They support the 130-year-old idea of their countryman Dmitri Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 他们支持他们同胞门捷列夫有130年历史的观点。

sentences.english: But mathematicians are still to have their Mendeleev moment.
sentences.chinese: 但是数学家们仍然学要他们的门捷列夫。

sentences.english: According to Mendeleyev's periodic table , there seem to be still some elements undiscovered yet .
sentences.chinese: 按照门捷列夫周期表，似乎还有一些元素尚未发现。

sentences.english: It has a lot, of course, about Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有很多关于门捷列夫的内容。

sentences.english: That is why we celebrate Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 那就是为什么我们要赞美门捷列夫。

sentences.english: Mendeleev, here is a picture of him taken from that period.
sentences.chinese: 869年，门捷列夫，这是他那个时期的照片。
